title: Watch Brands Increase the Use of Responsibly Mined Gold
description: But as yellow gold makes a comeback, businesses say it is not easy to find supplies.
dc:creator: Anders Modig

media:content.media:description: Melted gold flows out of a smelter into a bar mold at a plant run by the gold and silver refiner Argor-Heraeus in Mendrisio, Switzerland.
